sentence_zh_TW: 兩家公司的合併將創造出更強大的市場競爭力，並提升他們的業務覆蓋範圍。
sentence: The ______ of the two companies will create a stronger market competitiveness and enhance their business coverage.

sentence_zh_TW: 這首詩使用了隱喻來傳遞更深層的情感，讓讀者思考生活的真實意義。
sentence: This poem uses a ______ to convey deeper emotions, prompting readers to reflect on the true meaning of life.

sentence_zh_TW: 大都市的生活節奏快，常常是一個充滿活力和多樣性的環境。
sentence: Life in a ______ area is fast-paced and often characterized by a vibrant and diverse environment.

sentence_zh_TW: 在忙碌的工作環境中，找到放鬆的時刻是非常重要的，它教會我們如何給自己一些空間。
sentence: In the ______ of a busy work environment, finding moments to relax is crucial, teaching us the importance of giving ourselves some space.

sentence_zh_TW: 每年，數百萬種動物在遷徙過程中面臨艱難的考驗，為了尋找食物和適合的棲息地。
sentence: Every year, millions of animals face challenges during their ______, as they seek food and suitable habitats.

sentence_zh_TW: 成功完成這個項目將是我們公司的重要里程碑。
sentence: Successfully completing this project will be an important ______ for our company.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個縮小模型完美地展示了真實建築的每個細節。
sentence: This ______ model perfectly showcases every detail of the actual building.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個設計具有最小的元素，使其看起來簡潔而優雅。
sentence: This design has ______ elements, giving it a clean and elegant appearance.

sentence_zh_TW: 我們需要找到方法來最小化成本，同時保持產品的質量。
sentence: We need to find ways to ______ costs while maintaining the quality of the product.

sentence_zh_TW: 薄荷是很多人喜愛的香料，特別是在甜點中。
sentence: ______ is a popular herb loved by many, especially in desserts.

sentence_zh_TW: 這位傳教士在偏遠地區提供教育和醫療服務，幫助了很多人。
sentence: This ______ provides education and healthcare services in remote areas, helping many people.

sentence_zh_TW: 在安靜的夜晚，從附近的建筑物傳來微弱的呻吟聲。
sentence: On quiet nights, faint ______ can be heard from the nearby building.

sentence_zh_TW: 在學校裡，嘲笑弱小的同學是完全不可接受的行為。
sentence: Mocking weaker classmates at school is an entirely unacceptable behavior.

sentence_zh_TW: 使用這種模式可以幫助我們更有效地進行項目管理。
sentence: Using this ______ can help us manage projects more effectively.

sentence_zh_TW: 在編寫計劃書的過程中，我們需要不斷地修改和改進它。
sentence: During the process of writing the proposal, we need to continually ______ and improve it.

sentence_zh_TW: 水是一種由兩個氫原子和一個氧原子構成的分子。
sentence: Water is a ______ composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

sentence_zh_TW: 政府不允許任何企圖建立市場壟斷的行為，以保護消費者。
sentence: The government does not allow any attempts to establish a market ______ to protect consumers.

sentence_zh_TW: 在當代社會中，道德和倫理問題日益受到關注。
sentence: In contemporary society, issues of ______ and ethics are increasingly under scrutiny.

sentence_zh_TW: 根據最新的研究報告，這一疾病的死亡率在逐年上升。
sentence: According to the latest research report, the ______ rate of this disease is rising year by year.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多人在購房時需要得到抵押貸款才能完成交易。
sentence: Many people need to get a ______ loan to complete the transaction when buying a house.
